sentence.Network_en: Don't conceal the poverty of thought by the eccentric diction.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要用这些怪僻的词藻来掩饰思想的贫乏.

sentence.Network_en: His diction is noted for its freshness and vividness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以用字遣词清新生动见长.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting a word or phrase): from Latin dictio(n-), from dicere 'to say'

entry.def: Someone's diction is how clearly they speak or sing.

means.word_mean: 1. the articulation of speech regarded from the point of view of its intelligibility to the audience
2. the manner in which something is expressed in words;

auth_sentence.content: Her French accent was perfect, her diction faultless.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 对立的;引起矛盾的,爱反驳别人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: contradict[v.反驳;矛盾]+ory……的→adj.对立的;引起矛盾的,爱反驳别人的
vin力量+dict说话,断言,写+ive……的→adj.报复性的
addict[v.上瘾,入迷]+ion动作或状态→n.沉溺,上瘾
bene好+dict说+ion表名词→说好话
dict说话,断言,写+ion状态→说话状态→措辞
diction[n.措辞]+ary物→措辞的书→字典
dict说话,断言,写+um→说[出]的话→格言
e出+dict说话,断言,写→说出→布告

dictate[v.口授;[使]听写;指令,指示,命令]+or人→发命令者
inter在……中间+dict说话,断言,写→在中间说,不让做
juris司法+dict说话,断言,写+ion表名词→n.管辖权;司法权
male坏+dict说+ion表名词→说坏话
predict[v.预言,预报]+ion动作或状态→n.预言,预告;预报
vale再见+dict说话,断言,写+ion表名词→说再见
